Bueno el mother no es de lo mejor pero para uso
hogare�o sirve te paso las caracteristicas tecnicas:
CPU Socket A for AMD Athlon XP/ Thoroughbred/Barton
processors 
Chipset VIA KM400A
VIA VT8235 CE  
Front Side Bus 400/333/266/200 MHz  
Memory 2 x 184-pin DIMM Sockets support max. 2GB
PC2700/PC2100/PC1600 non-ECC DDR SDRAM memory  
VGA Integrated VIA UniChrome Graphics  
Expansion Slots 1 x AGP 8X/4X
3 x PCI  
IDE 2 x UltraDMA 133/100/66  
Audio ADI SoundMax 6-channel CODEC  
LAN VIA VT6103 10/100 Mbps Ethernet PHY  
USB Max. 6 USB2.0 ports  
Special Features - Power Loss Restart
- support S/PDIF out interface
- ASUS EZ Flash
- ASUS C.O.P. (CPU Overheating Protection)
- CrashFree BIOS  
Back Panel I/O Ports 1 x Parallel
1 x Serial
1 x PS/2 Keyboard
1 x PS/2 Mouse
1 x VGA
1 x Audio I/O
4 x USB 2.0
1 x RJ45  
Internal I/O Connectors -1 x USB 2.0 connector support
additional 2 USB 2.0 ports
-CPU / Chassis FAN connectors
-20 pin ATX Power connector
-IDE LED connector, power LED connetor
-Chassis Intrusion
-S/PDIF out connector
-COM2 connector
-CD / AUX audio in
-Front Audio Panel connector
-GAME/MIDI connector  
BIOS Feature 2Mb Flash ROM, Award BIOS, TCAV, PnP,
DMI2.0, WfM2.0, SM BIOS 2.3, ASUS EZ Flash, CrashFree
BIOS, ASUS C.O.P. (CPU Overheating Protection)  
Industry Standard PCI 2.2, USB 2.0  
Manageability WfM 2.0,DMI 2.0,WOL by PME,WOR by PME,
Chassis Intrusion  
Support CD ASUS PC Probe
Trend Micro PC-cillin anti-virus software
ASUS LiveUpdate Utility  
Accessories User's manual
UltraDMA cable
FDD cable
I/O shield  
From Factor Micro ATX Form Factor 9.6"x 9.6"(24.5cm x
24.5cm)  
Con respecto al micro la diferencia de dinero no es
mucha y es mejor el micro BOX, por la garantia.
Y el precio es bueno una pc de similares
caracteristicas yo la consigo en 800 u$s.
Saludos
